refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A fractal noise generator implemented as a white noise filtered by a cascade of 15 first-order filters.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para:
kbeta -- spectral parameter related to the fractal dimension
0 - white
1 - pink
2 - brown
